sentence.Network_en: It is true I am Shawnee. My forefathers were warriors. Their son is a warrior.
sentence.Network_cn: 确实,我是萧尼族人, 我的祖先都是战士. 他们的子孙也是战士.

list.abs: shawl 贝尔尼, shawnees 肖尼人, shawm 古双簧管

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Algonquian people formerly living along the Tennessee river
2. the Algonquian language spoken by the Shawnee people

auth_sentence.content: Currently he is a professor of Middle East studies at Shawnee State University.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Currently he is a professor of Middle East studies at Shawnee State University.
